ElasticEmailClient 1.0.0 API

ElasticEmailClient

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
elasticemail  
nanoxml  

ElasticEmailClient

ElasticEmailClient is a java library that lets you send emails with ElasticEmail's API. It does not cover the full API, but is enough to send an email and check its status.

Example

You write a bit of code to supply your credentials. Something like this:

public enum ElasticEmail {

        $;

        private ElasticEmailClient client = createElasticEmailClient();

        public ElasticEmailClient getClient() {
                return client;
        }

        private ElasticEmailClient createElasticEmailClient() {
                return new ElasticEmailClient(new ElasticEmailProperties() {
